attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to have Plymouth's Civic Centre building De-listed and demolished. Having spoken to several Plymouth Residents, The majority say it is an eyesore, disgusting building, blocks out the sunshine, looks ugly and is a monstrosity.

We need 100,000 signatures to have this heard at the house of commons...Will you sign it?

rejection.details: The listing and de-listing of buildings is a matter for English Heritage. Planning applications to demolish a building are a matter for the local authority.
